name: Diesel Locos Troubleshooting
description: This Application helps the user in troubleshooting assistance for different types of Diesel Locomotives(including DEMUs). Troubleshooting with the help of fault codes of different makes of propulsion and control systems. The Trouble can be accessed in 3 ways through Trouble category, by Fault Code and through Search Option.  Added advantage of this App is equipment locations can be found by touching and long pressing the compartment and also equipment location can be accessed by search option.  Instructions for day to day working of locos will familiarize the users and improves their working knowledge.
